name: Hooked by Huck
description:
You are a fisherman that starts with a very bad boat and a single rod to fish. Get fish, sell them on the market to get money. With it, you can buy upgrades but don't forget to repair your rods and boat! Sell the fish in the market that is paying more to get more profit. Your goal is to be a successful fisherman and find all the different types of fish in the game!

Please, fill the form after testing it to help us improve the game: https://forms.gle/U6ghbXPu44zwrfbG6

Contact: hookedbyhuck@gmail.com
